title: Was the cause of the fire at Cypress apartments that killed Rory Michaelson ever determined?  Also, three others were reported as being injured and her boyfriend was at the burn center in Chapel Hill.  How is he?
text:
Here's the latest story we had on this. We're still following up and
will do updates as warranted.
